name: Dermaplaning Tool for Face Exfoliation, with 20 Replaceable Blades, Facial Shaver/Eyebrow Razor, Peach Fuzz Removal Eyebrow Shaper for Women, Easy to Use Dermaplaner Help Exfoliate and Smooth Skin
short_description: Enjoy a Beauty Salon-Grade Experience at Home with Our Dermaplaning Tool: "Dermaplaning" is a hot commodity at spas and salons right now. What is Dermaplaning? Dermaplaning is a term for shaving your face. It is easily done at home. It is a highly effective way to exfoliate your skin and get rid of peach fuzz, which can trap dirt, oil and your foundation, and make you look older. Shaving is one of the most effective ways to help your foundation look flawless and make you look more youthful

Eyebrow Razors & Face Shavers for Women: COSYLIFE Dermaplaning Tool Set comes with 1 handle and 2 different blades (10 fin blades for dermaplaning and 10 coarse (serrated) blades for eyebrow shaving). Using for eyebrow repair and skin exfoliation, dead skin, and peach fuzz. Get perfectly shaped eyebrows with this high-end eyebrow shaper, and using the womens facial hair remover removes dirt, debris, dead skin cells and peach fuzz for a smooth and soft face

Dermaplaning Tool, Very Easy and Safe to Use: Designed with an ergonomic, anti-slip handle, our Dermaplaning Tool Set is extremely convenient and easy to use. Warm Tips: Please read our description carefully before using the face razors. Make sure your skin is dry - carefully move the blade down at a 45 degree angle in short strokes (this is not like shaving your legs) - do not press hard! Keep it feathery and light. Moisturize your skin afterwards

Anytime, Anywhere When Your Skin Call & Surprise a Special Her in Your Life: Safety caps make you can easily carry the face razor safely in any beauty bag or purse. Effectively removes any facial hair in minutes. So it is there to use whenever a touch-up is required. Spoil your girlfriend, spouse, mom, sister, or friends on any occasion. This facial hair removal tool in an elegant box packaging is ready to offer and impress

Safety Tips for Using This Dermaplane Razor: To avoid cuts, remember to pull the skin taut and keep the blade at a 45-degree angle against the skin; For the best dermaplaning treatment and to learn how to minimize cuts, please be sure to watch the video tutorial before use; When the dermablade is not in use, please cover blade with the protective cap. Normally, each blade lasts for about 4 weeks, please replace a new blade once it feels dull(Put the blade cap on when replacing the blade)
